comments.body: This change (and all the following 'easing' changes) have been done in a more recent version of ol (v3.20.0). Please update the version of the definition file accordingly.
Have you deliberately forgotten experimental optional option `hitTolerance`? See #13640
`hitTolerance` only appeared in v3.20.0. The modification here refers to v3.18.0. Since then, the definition file has been updated to v3.20 and this PR is outdated.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6679,6683 @@         * @api stable
         */
        forEachFeatureAtPixel<T>(
            pixel: ol.Pixel,
            callback: ((feature: (ol.Feature | ol.render.Feature), layer: ol.layer.Layer) => T),
